name: The World Conference on Sustainability, Energy, and Environment
content: The Sustainability conference 2022 is more than an event. It’s a platform for thought-provoking discussions, an opportunity to get published in prestigious indexed journals, and a chance to learn from a diverse group of academics, scholars, and researchers. Join us on the 08th-10th of April in Paris, France and soak in the knowledge, share findings from your research, learn about the latest trends, make new connections, network with the leading minds in the field, and explore the city. Whether you’d like to register as an attendee, submit your paper, or do a poster presentation, make sure to check out the important dates and add them to your calendar. World Conference on Sustainability, Energy, and Environment aim to bring together academia, researchers, and scholars in order to exchange and share their experiences and research results about all aspects of specialized and interdisciplinary fields. This power and energy conference provides an opportunity for all to network, share ideas and also present their research work. In addition, discussion on the latest innovations, trends and practical concerns and challenges faced in these fields are also encouraged. Join sustainability conference 2022 now!
